name.baseName: 土壤修复;异位修复;水泥窑协同处置;准备阶段;生料制备

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described industrial process is utilized for soil remediation through off-site cement kiln co-processing during the preparation stage at a cement factory. The facility has a modern dry process production line with a capacity of 4000t/d, producing 1.9 million tons of cement and 1.5 million tons of clinker annually. It operates a proprietary quarry with an area of 0.448km2 and an annual limestone production capacity of 2 million tons. The production process employs advanced RSP five-stage precalciner technology. Hazardous wastes are transported by trucks specially designed for hazardous materials on a dedicated freight route. The transportation distance from the quarry to the plant is approximately 1.5km, while the distance for waste transportation is about 50km. The conventional cement production process includes mining and transportation of raw materials, raw meal preparation, coal powder preparation, clinker calcination, and cement grinding. By incorporating waste disposal into the process, waste materials (such as contaminated soil, digested sewage sludge, and waste drilling mud) can be used as alternative raw materials and fuels, conserving limestone and coal. During the cement kiln co-processing preparation stage, the raw meal preparation mainly involves the crushing, homogenization, drying, and grinding of raw and auxiliary materials such as limestone, shale, and industrial waste (contaminated soil, digested sewage sludge, and waste catalysts). This is considered a unit process (single operation).

水泥厂拥有一条4000t/d规模的现代化干法生产线，年生产水泥190万t，熟料150万t．公司自有矿山面积0.448km2，年生产石灰石能力200万t.生产工艺采用具有先进水平的RSP五级窑外分解技术．危险废物均采用汽车运输方式，配置危险品专用车辆，行车路线为货车专用线.矿山至厂区的运输距离约1.5km，废弃物的运输距离约50km．常规水泥的生产过程主要包括原辅材料的幵采及运输、生料制备、煤粉制备、熟料煅烧和水泥粉磨等阶段， 添加废弃物处置环节后， 废弃物（污染土壤、消化污泥、废油泥等）可以用作替代原料和替代燃料，以节省石灰石和煤炭等原材料。水泥窑协同处置，准备阶段，生料制备过程，主要包括石灰石、页岩等原辅料及工业废物（污染土壤、消化污泥和废催化剂等）的破碎、预均化、烘干及粉磨。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process is utilized for soil remediation through off-site cement kiln co-processing during the preparation stage at a cement factory. The facility has a modern dry process production line with a capacity of 4000t/d, producing 1.9 million tons of cement and 1.5 million tons of clinker annually. It operates a proprietary quarry with an area of 0.448km2 and an annual limestone production capacity of 2 million tons. The production process employs advanced RSP five-stage precalciner technology. Hazardous wastes are transported by trucks specially designed for hazardous materials on a dedicated freight route. The transportation distance from the quarry to the plant is approximately 1.5km, while the distance for waste transportation is about 50km. The conventional cement production process includes mining and transportation of raw materials, raw meal preparation, coal powder preparation, clinker calcination, and cement grinding. By incorporating waste disposal into the process, waste materials (such as contaminated soil, digested sewage sludge, and waste drilling mud) can be used as alternative raw materials and fuels, conserving limestone and coal. During the cement kiln co-processing preparation stage, the raw meal preparation mainly involves the crushing, homogenization, drying, and grinding of raw and auxiliary materials such as limestone, shale, and industrial waste (contaminated soil, digested sewage sludge, and waste catalysts). This is considered a unit process (single operation).

本工业过程用于水泥厂准备阶段的土壤修复异位水泥窑协同处置。该工厂配备有4000t/d产能的现代化干法生产线，年产水泥190万吨，熟料150万吨。公司自有矿山面积0.448平方公里，年产石灰石200万吨。生产过程采用先进的RSP五级预分解技术。危险废物由配置专用的危险品车辆通过货车专用线路运输。从矿山到厂区的运输距离约为1.5公里，废弃物的运输距离约为50公里。传统的水泥生产过程包括原辅材料开采及运输、生料制备、煤粉制备、熟料煅烧和水泥粉磨等阶段。通过添加废弃物处置环节，废旧物料（如污染土壤、消化污泥和废油泥等）可作为替代原料和燃料使用，以节约石灰石和煤炭等原材料。水泥窑协同处置准备阶段的生料制备主要涉及石灰石、页岩及工业废物（污染土壤、消化污泥和废催化剂等）的破碎、预均化、烘干及粉磨，属于单元过程（单一操作）。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: LCA data users should note that the inclusion of waste material co-processing in cement production is specific to this dataset and reflects an alternative resource approach. When employing this data set, it is crucial to acknowledge the scope boundaries and the technological applicability of the described process. This includes understanding the use of hazardous waste as alternative raw materials and fuels and its implications for material and energy balances. Transport distances for raw materials and wastes should be considered when modeling transportation impacts. The five-stage precalciner technology should be factored in as a specific technology that may not be representative of all cement production facilities. Proper allocation methods must be applied when attributing environmental impacts to the main product (cement) and co-products or avoided productions due to waste co-processing.

生命周期评估（LCA）数据使用者应注意，废物协同处理纳入水泥生产的情况是特定于此数据集的，反映了一种替代资源方法。在使用这个数据集时，关键是要承认所描述过程的范围界限和技术适用性。这包括理解危险废物作为替代原材料和燃料的使用及其对材料和能源平衡的影响。建模运输影响时，应考虑原材料和废物的运输距离。五级预分解技术应作为一种特定技术考虑进去，它可能并不代表所有水泥生产设施。在将环境影响归因于主产品（水泥）以及由于废物协同处理而避免的副产品或产量时，必须应用适当的分摊方法。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
